# --description-- Normalize your box model by creating a `*` selector and setting the `box-sizing` property to `border-box` as the value. # --hints-- You should have a `*` selector. ```js assert.exists(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('*')); ``` Your `*` selector should have a `box-sizing` property set to `border-box` as the value. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('*')?.boxSizing === 'border-box'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Photo Gallery
